title: How To Make Curly Fries With Products From Abt
description:
How To Make Curly Fries Using Abt Products
Rosle Peeler - http://www.abt.com/product/12682/Rosle-12735.html
Paderno Slicer - http://www.abt.com/product/85296/Paderno-2141.html
T-Fal ActiFry - http://www.abt.com/product/58279/T-Fal-FZ700251.html

Making curly fries just got a whole lot easier. With products that you can purchase at Abt curly fries can now be made in the comfort of your home in 3 easy steps. 

1. The Rosle Peeler has a sturdy and balanced handle that makes it easy to peel the potato. 

2. Placing the potato into the Paderno vegetable slicer with the desired cutter you turn the handle to slice it into the curls we need. 

3. After cutting into smaller pieces you put it into the healthy fryer and add some oil. After 30-40 mins its done and ready to eat. Enjoy!
